# [Interview #1112: JordanCon 6 - Cosmere questions, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1112#9)

#### rossnewberry

Finally, Isaac taught us how to say Bridge 4 in Alethi,

#### Isaac Stewart

which is "vev gesheh." Vev = 4, Gesheh = bridge.
